name: actuator
description: A small utility for easily unit testing Hubot scripts.
author: Declan de Wet <declan@io.co.za>

scripts.build: mv lib src && coffee -o lib -c src
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish . && npm run unbuild
scripts.coveralls: npm run build && istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage && npm run unbuild
